plot: Del has a consignment of doorbells that play various National Anthems. He tries to help Rodney and Cassandra save their marriage after going round to fix rodneys front door but things don't quite go to plan. Raquel has an audition for a part in a play. She passes the audition but is unable to accept it as she has some news that leaves Del speechless...but not for long.—ledostef, blackpool

Del is trying to sell his consignment of dodgy and tacky doorbells - which play the National Anthem of 26 different countries! Meanwhile, he's also up to slightly more worthwhile work, attempting to engineer a happy reunion between Rodney and Cassy. Will they chime and successfully push each other's buttons - or could it be the death knell for their rocky relationship?—stevecann2003
